question_text: An office printer is set up with multiple trays for different purposes. Which two configurations are most appropriate for optimizing workflow? (Select two)
answer_options: Tray 2: photo paper, Tray 3: firmware updates
Tray 1: color ink, Tray 2: black toner
explanation: Using separate trays for specific paper types like envelopes, legal, and letterhead improves efficiency and reduces manual reloading.
